name: P3nis Enlargement Pills (The Game)
description:
Venture into the halls of an abandoned high school and collect as many Penis Enlargement Pills as you can before... HE gets you...

This game was made in collaboration with Cole Perrine, the original creator of the viral meme. His face and body were 3D scanned in and voice lines recorded. It was not Gus Johnson, stop saying it was Gus Johnson.
